DataElement.preferredDefinition: The time of PK sample collection or start time for a specimen collected over a period of time (protocol-defined time-point range) represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to pharmacokinetic concentration._The hour, minute, and/or second at which the sample or data was collected.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the time of the PK s
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the time of the PK sample collection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record time of collection (as complete as possible).

ReferenceDocuments.name: PCDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable PCDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A complete time is expected. The SDTMIG PCDTC variable contains either a date/time when a specimen is collected at a point in time or the start date/time, when a specimen is collected over time.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PK Concentrations
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the (start) time of the PK sample collection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Alternate Question Text - PK Concentrations
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the (start) time of the PK sample collection?
